items.title: 16 hololive VTubers to take over Twitch for “holoday” collab event this November
items.author: James Richardson
items.content: COVER Corporation has announced "holoday," its first-ever official online collaboration event with the global live-streaming service, Twitch.

items.title: New hololive 2.5D fighting game will see Usada Pekora battle Houshou Marine
items.author: James Richardson
items.content: A new 2.5D fighting action game has been announced, based on the popular VTuber unit "hololive Fantasy."

items.title: hololive’s next indie game is a Papers, Please-style inspection game to spot fake VTubers
items.author: James Richardson
items.content: A new, official fan-made game has been announced under the "holo Indie" brand—a "VTuber Entrance Inspection Quiz Game" titled Hologuard.

items.title: hololive’s Houshou Marine is getting her own line of instant ramen
items.author: Charlotte Davis
items.content: A new collaboration has been announced between the Japanese supermarket chain Ito-Yokado and the popular VTuber, Houshou Marine, from the group hololive.

items.title: hololive’s Ao Hiodoshi announces graduation following medical hiatus
items.author: Charlotte Davis
items.content: The VTuber agency Cover Corporation has announced that Ao Hiodoshi, a member of the group "hololive DEV_IS," will be graduating from her activities.

items.title: New official hololive fan club offers early access to concert tickets and exclusive merch
items.author: James Richardson
items.content: Cover Corporation has announced the launch of a new, official fan club for the popular VTuber group hololive.
